title: Los Perdidos MC
description: Jenny Chapman is a typical college student, her life filled with classes, homework, and her campus job. But she's bored with her routine and uncertain about her future.When Jenny and a group of her friends decide to check out the local biker bar on a whim, she has a steamy encounter with Smoke, the vice-president of the Los Perdidos motorcycle club. The chemistry between them is instant, and Jen finds herself propelled into a world of danger and passion unlike anything she's ever known. What will Jen be willing to risk for the biker bad boy who gives her the ride of a lifetime?
author: Daphne Loveling
